name: Spirit Stones
description:
Journey through 500 exciting stages in the quest to save Brikeaz!

Create your party and master the puzzle board!

Connect and challenge other players around the world!

Spirit Stones is a mix of styles that works really well. (148Apps)

“Two versatile game types that marry perfectly.” (Touch Arcade)

Spirit Stones simply breaks down all barriers thanks to dynamic deck building and addictive combat. (Gamezebo)

“It's a puzzle battle game like many before it, but Spirit Stones has a polish and a style that I really enjoy. In a genre full of imitators, aesthetics are important. (Kotaku)

JOIN THE FIGHT IN THE NEW CLAN BATTLE!

  • Join your clan members to win the Clan Battle!

  • A strong Clan Monster is worth 10 heroes! Make your Clan Monster stronger!

CREATE AN UNBEATABLE GROUP

  • Summon over 500 unique and attractive hero types!

  • Enchant! Evolve! Upgrade your heroes to create an unbeatable group!

MASTER THE PUZZLE BOARD

  • Connect colored blocks to trigger exciting battle sequences!

  • Use your luck and cunning to form consecutive combos!

FIGHT TO BECOME THE BEST OF ALL!

  • Fight with other players from all over the world! Try to lead the Global Ranking weekly!

  • Work together to defeat Hellboss!

** This game is available in 한국어, English, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Français, Deutsch, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Português, Русский, Español, ไทย and Vietnam!

** Additional costs may apply if you attempt to obtain certain items.
